trans-unit.source: Represents the token defined by the WS-SecureConversation specification.
An instance of this class contains key material along with authentication information that represents the client.
The user selects the particular cryptographic algorithm to use with it.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityToken"></xref> class.
The `contextId` should be unique among all security context tokens issued by the service.
A <xref:System.Xml.UniqueId> that represents the context id.
A byte array that represents the key.
The effective start time.
The expiration time.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityToken"></xref> class.
The `contextId` should be unique among all security context tokens issued by the service.
A <xref:System.Xml.UniqueId> that represents the context id.
The token id.
A byte array that represents the key.
The effective start time.
The expiration time.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityToken"></xref> class.
The `contextId` should be unique among all security context tokens issued by the service.
A <xref:System.Xml.UniqueId> that represents the context id.
The token id.
A byte array that represents the key.
The effective start time.
The expiration time.
A read-only collection of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> instances that represents the party to whom the token is issued.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityToken"></xref> class.
The `contextId` should be unique among all security context tokens issued by the service.
A <xref:System.Xml.UniqueId> that represents the context id.
The token id.
A byte array that represents the key.
The effective start time.
The expiration time.
A <xref:System.Xml.UniqueId> that represents the key generation.
The key effective start time.
The key expiration time.
A read-only collection of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> instances that represents the party to whom the token is issued.
Gets a read-only collection of token authorization policies.
A read-only collection of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> instances.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty"></xref> extracted from the bootstrap message.
A security message property.
To be added.
Gets the context id.
A <xref:System.Xml.UniqueId> that represents the context id.
Creates a security context token cookie.
A <xref:System.Xml.UniqueId> that represents the context id.
The token id.
A byte array that represents the key.
The effective start time.
The expiration time.
A read-only collection of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> instances.
The security state encoder.
A security context token cookie.
Creates a security context token cookie.
A <xref:System.Xml.UniqueId> that represents the context id.
The token id.
A byte array that represents the key.
The effective start time.
The expiration time.
A <xref:System.Xml.UniqueId> that represents the key generation.
The key effective start time.
The key expiration time.
A read-only collection of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> instances.
The security state encoder.
A security context token cookie.
To be added.
Releases unmanaged resources used by this instance of this object.
Use this method to close or release unmanaged resources, such as files, streams, and handles held by an instance of the class that implements this interface.
This method is, by convention, used for all tasks associated with freeing resources held by an object, or preparing an object for reuse.
[!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>.
Gets the token id.
The token id.
Gets a value that indicates whether a security context token (SCT) with a mode setting that specifies how cookies are handled is read in.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a cookie mode SCT is read in; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the key effective start time.
A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the key effective start time.
Gets the key expiration time.
A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the key expiration time.
Gets the key generation.
Starting with the [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)], this property is emitted on the wire as an <`sc:Instance`> element.
In prior versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], it was emitted as an <`sc:Generation`> element.
A <xref:System.Xml.UniqueId> that represents the key generation.
Indicates whether the current token's key identifier clause matches a specified key identifier clause.
The specified key identifier clause.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current token's key identifier clause matches a specified key identifier clause; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a read-only collection of security keys.
A read-only collection of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"></xref> instances.
Generates a text representation of the current instance of this object.
A text representation of the current instance of this object.
Gets the token effective start time.
A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the token effective start time.
Gets the token expiration time.
A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the token expiration time.
